3.eng-name: The Book of Menstruation and Istihadah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Mu'adhah Al-'Adawiyyah said:"A woman asked 'Aishah: 'Should a menstruating woman make up the Salah she misses? She said: 'Are you a Haruri? [1] We used to menstruate during the time of Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) but we did not make up the missed Salah nor were we commanded to do so.'" [1] Meaning are you one of the Khawarij. Harura is a place associated with a group of the Khawarij

chapter.eng-name: Salah Is Not Obligatory For Menstruating Women
